alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Hamlin (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 3:12PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN DEUEL AND SOUTHEASTERN HAMLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 412 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stone Bridge, or over Lake Poinsett, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Estelline, Lake Poinsett, Claremont Colony, Poinsett Colony, Stone Bridge, and Dempster. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
